sn2.12:4.1: Standing to one side, the god Vishnu recited this verse in the Buddha’s presence:
sn2.12:5.2: who pay homage to the Holy One!
sn2.12:5.3: They apply themselves to Gotama’s instructions,
sn2.12:6.1: “Those who practice absorption in accord with the training
sn2.12:6.2: in the way of teaching I’ve proclaimed,” said the Buddha to Vishnu,
sn2.12:6.4: they won’t fall under the sway of Death.”
